00022 void OmniDriveKinematicsModel::convert(const double& x1, const double& y1, const double& theta, double& x2, double& y2, bool inverse) {
00023     
00024     double k = (inverse == true) ? 1:-1;
00025     
00026     x2 = (x1 * cos(theta) + y1 * sin(theta)) * k;
00027     y2 = (y1 * cos(theta) - x1 * sin(theta)) * k; 
00028 }
00029 
00030 void OmniDriveKinematicsModel::convertToLocalReferenceFrame(const Odometry& globalFrame, Odometry& localFrame) {
00031     
00032     double locPosX = 0;
00033     double locPosY = 0;
00034     
00035     convert(globalFrame.getPose2D().getX(), 
00036             globalFrame.getPose2D().getY(), 
00037             globalFrame.getPose2D().getTheta(), 
00038             locPosX, 
00039             locPosY, 
00040             true);
00041     
00042     double locVelX = 0;
00043     double locVelY = 0;
00044     
00045     convert(globalFrame.getTwist2D().getX(), 
00046             globalFrame.getTwist2D().getY(), 
00047             globalFrame.getPose2D().getTheta(), 
00048             locVelX, 
00049             locVelY, 
00050             true);
00051     
00052     localFrame = Odometry(Pose2D(locPosX, locPosY, globalFrame.getPose2D().getTheta()), 
00053             Twist2D(locVelX, locVelY, globalFrame.getTwist2D().getTheta()));
00054 }
00055 
00056 void OmniDriveKinematicsModel::convertToGlobalReferenceFrame(const Odometry& localFrame, Odometry& globalFrame) {
00057        
00058     double globPosX = 0;
00059     double globPosY = 0;
00060     
00061     convert(localFrame.getPose2D().getX(), 
00062             localFrame.getPose2D().getY(), 
00063             localFrame.getPose2D().getTheta(), 
00064             globPosX, 
00065             globPosY, 
00066             false);
00067     
00068     double globVelX = 0;
00069     double globVelY = 0;
00070     
00071     convert(localFrame.getTwist2D().getX(), 
00072             localFrame.getTwist2D().getY(), 
00073             localFrame.getPose2D().getTheta(), 
00074             globVelX, 
00075             globVelY, 
00076             false);
00077     
00078     globalFrame = Odometry(Pose2D(globPosX, globPosY, localFrame.getPose2D().getTheta()), 
00079             Twist2D(globVelX, globVelY, localFrame.getTwist2D().getTheta()));
00080 }
